None.Name: Fire Ball
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, tower hurls a fire ball that deals 216 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 324 in total.

None.Name: Volcanic Ground
None.Description: Activate to set ground on fire and unleash 3 fire waves that each deal 200 damage damage to enemies in a 25m radius around its target, up to 1000 in total. Affects ground targets only. Reusable every 30 seconds.
